# BFG replace rules for purging leaked secrets from history
# Exact literals
CustomerPortal2025!==>***REMOVED***
Welcome123!==>***REMOVED***
FieldService123!==>***REMOVED***
abc123==>***REMOVED***
# base64 for demo123
ZGVtbzEyMw====>***REMOVED***
# Common env secret assignments (loose patterns)
regex:(?i)\b(JWT_SECRET|SESSION_SECRET)\s*=\s*[^\r\n]+==>$1=***REMOVED***
